entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.

entry.title: dpembo/BackupHub: BackupHub is a lightweight yet powerful solution for managing and scheduling shell-based executions across a local area network, typically backup operations, but could be anything!
entry.content: BackupHub is a lightweight yet powerful solution for managing and scheduling shell-based executions across a local area network, typically backup operations, but could be anything!

entry.title: Zerous12/PDF-viewer-with-Pyside6-and-QWebEngine: This project is a simple and lightweight PDF viewer built with PySide6 and QWebEngineView, using Mozilla's PDF.js to render PDF files in a browser-like widget. It offers an easy way to embed PDF viewing capabilities into desktop applications using Python and Qt.
entry.content: This project is a simple and lightweight PDF viewer built with PySide6 and QWebEngineView, using Mozilla's PDF.js to render PDF files in a browser-like widget. It offers an easy way to embed PDF viewing capabilities into desktop applications using Python and Qt.

entry.title: Nexacore-Org/ByteChain-Academy: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
entry.content: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

entry.content: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.content: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes.
